1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Shahira has just woken up from a 20 year coma. Shahira is trying to adapt to life in 2016 but she finds it hard as she realizes that the world has changed. Shahira feels lost when she realizes everything, including her friends, have changed. Shahira gets frustrated living in a world which is so obsessed with technology and social media. But like it or not, she has to adapt to the present. In order adapt to the changed times and get her life back on track, Shahira decides to pick up where she left off - enroll herself back into university.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Shahira is back in university and meets with Hannah (who is Instafamous), Raiyan (who is a hipster), Arina (who's famous for her online fitness channel 'Yogarina') and Haris (the joker). Shahira's much younger classmates are surprised to find Shahira in their class. They also find Shahira's 90s references to music, technology and pop culture odd. The only one who is kind to Shahira is Raiyan. But this leads to rumors spreading online from a well-known troll site named 'KenaBahan.SG' about Shahira is now dating Raiyan, a boy almost half her age. Will Shahira survive ...

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Shahira is slowly adapting to life in 2017. She has made friends with Arina and she has also made peace with Sufi, an old neighbor who once liked to tease her when they were younger. In her attempt to learn more about life in the present, Shahira attempts to try connect and track down her old friends, especially Zaid, by signing up to Facebook. But she finds out that finding them online is much harder than it seems. Meanwhile, Raiyan shows signs that he is interested with Hannah, who seems oblivious of his intentions.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Azizah grows worried when she realizes that Shahira is now using social media to search for Zaid. Azizah is worried that the secret that she is keeping with regards to Zaid may be exposed. Salim tells Azizah to just reveal the secret to Shahira but Azizah insists on not doing so. Azizah even meets up with Rita, Lina and Nani to continue to be careful with the secret pertaining to Zaid, especially on social media. Meanwhile, Haris finds Hannah acting odd and it seems like she is keeping a secret from him, which leads to Haris going all out to find out what secret ...

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Shahira finds out the truth about Zaid and feels betrayed, which leads to a falling out between her and Nani. Azizah is now angry with Sufi as she figured out that it was Sufi who helped Shahira with her Facebook account, which led to Zaid's secret being revealed. Meanwhile, Shahira and Sufi grow closer together as Shahira learns more and more about Sufi. Hannah, on the other hand, has received an offer to be the ambassador for a cosmetic company, May Bliss, and this could potentially result in a huge paycheck for her, which excites Hannah.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Hannah's secret is exposed and this leads Hannah to lose the May Bliss sponsorship to make her their product ambassador. Hannah is devastated by this and chooses to avoid contact with other people. Arina, on the other hand, is also facing her own issues dealing with trolls who say she is unfit to have an online fitness video channel. This leads to Arina to push herself excessively in the gym to prove the trolls wrong. Meanwhile, in a bid to stop Shahira from getting close to Sufi, Azizah devises a plan to get Shahira close to someone else - and that person turns out ...

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Hannah's secret is exposed and this leads Hannah to lose the May Bliss cosmetics ambassador deal. Hannah is devastated by this and chooses to avoid contact with other people. Arina is also facing her own issues dealing with trolls who say she is unfit to have an online fitness video channel. Meanwhile, in a bid to stop Shahira from getting close to Sufi, Azizah devises a plan to get Shahira close to someone else - Kamal.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Hannah, Raiyan, Arina, and Sufi are shocked to find out who is behind KenaBahan.SG. Azizah, on the other hand, forgives and accepts Sufi, which surprises Shahira. Azizah also plans to celebrate Shahira's 40th birthday which is coming soon. Shahira is initially not keen as she fears no one would be interested but she grows to love the idea when she sees her old friends and even new course-mates all excited to go to her birthday party. However, things take a weird turn when Shahira finds out that a young girl is going to be staying in her home - Zaid and Nani's daughter...

imdb.plot outline: Shahira is a 39-year-old woman who has just woken up from a 20-year coma and realizes that everything has changed. The world she once knew, where the Malay rap music and girl bands are at the height of its popularity and smart technology was at its infancy, no longer exists. Replacing it is a world where everything revolves around technology and society whose lives are intrinsically intertwined with social media. Even Shahira's friends have all changed, from young carefree teenagers to busy mothers and career women. Now Shahira has to adapt and learn about everything that is new in 2017. However, mentally Shahira still feels stuck in the past and cannot seem to move on, especially when it comes to her music, her friends and her first love, Zaid, who is now nowhere to be found. She now has to embrace the changing times and shake off her past.
imdb.title: InstaGeram
plot: Shahira is a 39-year-old woman who has just woken up from a 20-year coma and realizes that everything has changed. The world she once knew, where the Malay rap music and girl bands are at the height of its popularity and smart technology was at its infancy, no longer exists. Replacing it is a world where everything revolves around technology and society whose lives are intrinsically intertwined with social media. Even Shahira's friends have all changed, from young carefree teenagers to busy mothers and career women. Now Shahira has to adapt and learn about everything that is new in 2017. However, mentally Shahira still feels stuck in the past and cannot seem to move on, especially when it comes to her music, her friends and her first love, Zaid, who is now nowhere to be found. She now has to embrace the changing times and shake off her past.
